title: Introduction to prompt engineering
why: The Prompt Engineering Basics exam helps learners develop a strong foundation in crafting clear and effective inputs for AI models like ChatGPT. It introduces core concepts such as prompt clarity, structure, zero-shot vs few-shot prompting, and response control, allowing beginners to communicate better with AI systems and generate high-quality outputs confidently.

questions.question: What is 'prompt engineering' in the context of AI?
options: Designing inputs for AI models to get desired outputs
Training humans to speak to robots
questions.correctAnswer: Designing inputs for AI models to get desired outputs

questions.question: Which of the following is a good prompt style for ChatGPT?
options: Explain photosynthesis in simple words suitable for a 10-year-old.
questions.correctAnswer: Explain photosynthesis in simple words suitable for a 10-year-old.

questions.question: Which tool is often used with prompt engineering?
What does the word 'prompt' mean in prompt engineering?
options: The input or instruction given to an AI model
questions.correctAnswer: The input or instruction given to an AI model

questions.question: What kind of language should prompts use?
Which of these is a well-structured prompt?
options: Generate a 100-word poem about sunrise in the style of Shakespeare.
questions.correctAnswer: Generate a 100-word poem about sunrise in the style of Shakespeare.

questions.question: Why is prompt clarity important?
options: So the AI can ignore it
So the user gets random answers
So the AI gives a more accurate response
questions.correctAnswer: So the AI gives a more accurate response

Providing no examples and asking the model to complete the task

options: Giving a few examples to guide the model
